name: Space Firefighters
description:
Game made in 24 hours for the Lunar Jam where you will have to survive a chaotic space collecting the maximum amount of coins possible, but be careful because you only have 10 seconds of fluel.

CONTROLS:

- Mouse left click (to play)

- R (to restart)

- Esc (to open the menu)

THERE IS UPLOADED

- Computer version 

- Art  in .aseprite
